posts.title: His mother
posts.body: But the stupidity of the group of people he was talking to made him change his mind.

posts.title: a discipline
posts.body: He was an expert but not in a discipline that anyone could fully appreciate.

posts.title: Dave watched
posts.body: Dave watched as the forest burned up on the hill

posts.title: All he wanted
posts.body: All he wanted was a candy bar.

posts.title: Hopes and dreams
posts.body: Hopes and dreams were dashed that day.

posts.title: Dave wasn't
posts.body: Dave wasn't exactly sure how he had ended up in this predicament.
